name: BEACNpool (BEACN) — Receipts-First DRep
summary: Community-first Cardano governance. Public money demands public receipts. We flag missing proof, not people.

voting_principles: Receipts-first: spending proposals must include clear recipients, deliverables, milestones, and verification links.
Flags ≠ fraud: a flag means missing/weak public proof and a request for receipts.
Prefer decentralization: support proposals that strengthen independent operators and reduce capture risks.
Prefer open source: public funds should produce public artifacts (code, documentation, datasets) whenever possible.
Minimize extraction: prioritize community benefit over rent-seeking business models.
disclosures: BEACN operates as a community-first stake pool (0% margin; minimal fixed fee).
This DRep profile is informational and does not constitute financial advice.

mission.title: Givers, Not Takers
mission.text: We didn’t create BEACN to extract value from Cardano. We created it to give back to the ecosystem that gave us so much.
